Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Advanced Plastic^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^green;Science Outpost^reset;
Texts.Chs: 把^orange;高级塑料^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。

Texts.Eng: Excellent! You'll need a lot of plastic, so keep well stocked.
Texts.Chs: 优秀，你应该要储存一些这种材料，因为你会发现它是不可或缺的。

Texts.Eng: If you're going to make it as a scientist, you are going to need ^orange;Advanced Plastic^reset;. Find some ^orange;oil^reset; from a ^green;Desert^reset; or from ^orange;bones^reset; and then head to your ^orange;Bio Lab^reset;. Bring me back one single piece!
Texts.Chs: 如果你打算成为一名科学家，那么你将会需要^orange;高级塑料^reset;。从^orange;沙漠^reset;里或者^orange;骨头^reset;中^reset;找到^green;油^reset;，然后使用你的^orange;生化实验台^reset;制造出高级塑料，并把它带给我。
